command_description: Generate an Jitsi video meeting URL.
jitsi_title_prefix_description: Text added before the title when identifying a video conference.
jitsi_title_suffix_description: Text added after the title when identifying a video conference.
jitsi_room_id_type_description: Select which information should be used to identify the Jitsi call.
jitsi_jwt_description: Valid JWT Token which is added to all of the conference links. Keep it empty if you do not use JWT or you do not want to append a token when creating the link!
jitsi_application_id_description: The app id to use when generating authentication tokens.
jitsi_application_secret_description: The app secret to use when generating authentication tokens.
jitsi_limit_token_to_room_description: If enabld, generated tokens will grant access only to the intended jitsi room.
jitsi_token_auditor_description: The name of the auditor to use when generating authentication tokens.
